Pledges.description: LET'S GET A COFFEE ALL TOGETHER - Thanks for supporting us with coffee! If you come to the UDOO Lab, we will be more than happy to return the favor. By backing us at this level, you also get access to our  Q&A section.
WEAR IT - Get 1x UDOO T-shirt and share our motto: "With UDOO there's nothing you can't do!" We'll get in touch with you as soon as the campaign ends to let you choose the size you want.
EARLY BIRD UDOO Neo Basic! Get 1x UDOO Neo Basic with 512MB of RAM, wireless module (no ethernet and no motion sensors).
EARLY BIRD UDOO Neo! Get 1x UDOO Neo with 1GB of RAM, wireless module, fast ethernet (10/100 Mbps) and 9-axis motion sensors.
UDOO Neo Basic! Get 1x UDOO Neo Basic with 512MB of RAM, wireless module (no ethernet and no motion sensors).
UDOO Neo! Get 1x UDOO Neo with 1GB of RAM, wireless module, fast ethernet (10/100 Mbps) and 9-axis motion sensors.

UDOO Neo Basic with Accessory Kit! Get 1x UDOO Neo Basic with 512 MB of RAM, wireless module (no ethernet and no motion sensors) plus 1x Accessory Kit, including: a 12V 2A AC power adapter suitable for the country of sale, HDMI to Micro HDMI Cable, USB to Micro USB Type B CABLE and Micro SD 8GB.

UDOO Neo with Accessory Kit! Get 1x UDOO Neo with 1GB of RAM, wireless module, fast ethernet (10/100 Mbps) and 9-axis motion sensors plus 1x Accessory Kit, including: a 12V 2A AC power adapter suitable for the country of sale, HDMI to Micro HDMI Cable, USB to Micro USB Type B CABLE and Micro SD 8GB.
A couple of UDOO Neo Basic! Get 2x UDOO Neo Basic, with 512MB of RAM, wireless module (no ethernet and no motion sensors).
A couple of UDOO Neo! Get 2x UDOO Neo with 1GB of RAM, wireless module, fast ethernet (10/100 Mbps) and 9-axis motion sensors.

Maker Kit UDOO Neo! Get 1x UDOO Neo with 1GB of RAM, wireless module, fast ethernet (10/100 Mbps) and 9-axis motion sensors plus 1x KIT LCD 7" Touch, 1x Accessory Kit, including: a 12V 2A AC power adapter suitable for the country of sale, HDMI to Micro HDMI Cable, USB to Micro USB Type B CABLE and micro SD 8GB.
IoT Kit UDOO Neo! Get 5x UDOO Neo with 1GB of RAM, wireless module, fast ethernet (10/100 Mbps) and 9-axis motion sensors.

Edu Kit UDOO Neo! Get 5x UDOO Neo with 1GB of RAM, wireless module, fast ethernet (10/100 Mbps) and 9-axis motion sensors plus 2x KIT LCD 7" Touch, 5x Accessory Kit, including: a 12V 2A AC power adapter suitable for the country of sale, HDMI to Micro HDMI Cable, USB to Micro USB Type B CABLE and micro SD 8GB.
